prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with sharp fins and a fierce expression.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a land shark with blue scales and red accents.
Generate an aggressive-looking Pokemon with a muscular build and unique wing shape.
Make a powerful dragon Pokemon that can navigate both land and air effortlessly.
Imagine a Pokemon with a streamlined body and strong claws, perfect for battles.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed and strength, with a striking color palette.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon combining ground and dragon elements in its design.
